did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Grading of Students at the University of Arizona, 1928-1929
did.abstract: Typescript (original) report with holograph tables and charts proceeded by a letter of transmittal to President Homer L. Shantz.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Grading of Students at the University of Arizona (AZ 270). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Compiled by Professor George F. Herrick, of Accounting, in an attempt to evaluate the severity of grading of students by the various instructors in the University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (original) report with holograph tables and charts. Preceeded by a letter of transmittal to President Homer L. Shantz.
